summary: A beautiful young woman asks Holmes to help her father, a former army captain and hopeless opium addict break free of the curse surrounding a stolen treasure.
cast: Charlton Heston|Richard Johnson|Susannah Harker|Edward Fox|John Castle|Simon Callow|Clive Wood|James Coyle|Kaleem Janjua|Stefan Kalipha|Lloyd McGuire|Kiran Shah|Sidney Livingstone|Roly Lamas
title: El crucifijo de sangre
